column1: Uchi////-Fried Milk (4/5): A dessert to definitely try out! I can see why this is so popular. Everything was great! The only part that sucks is that the best part of the dish are the fried milk balls
column2: but there was only enough for one per person (3 total)
column3: not to mention that they're tiny. Note that this Â also wasn't on the happy hour menu.
